subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The matchup features two teams that rely heavily on their running backs, DeMarco Murray and Matt Forte, and the winner may very well be decided by which player performs closest to the high standard he has set in 2014.
snippet: The matchup features two teams that rely heavily on their running backs, DeMarco Murray and Matt Forte, and the winner may very well be decided by which player performs closest to the high standard he has set in 2014.
